pages.text: $(l:blocks/basalt)Basalt$(), $(l:blocks/blackstone)blackstone$() and many small spots of $(l:fluids/lava)lava$() make the terrain of this amplified-looking biome. It is the only place for $(l:mobs/slime)magma cubes$() to spawn, and they are aided by $(l:mobs/ghast)ghasts$(). The blackstone may contain a gilded variant as a reward.
